replies.body: Nah, everyone knows you buy flask as Nasus. Oh wait...
R.I.P. the good flask :(
what do you mean? {{item:2033}} is actually a pretty decent starting item

It would be if it didn't cost 150 more gold than the old one for 10 less mana and a sad amount of lingering damage. I know I shouldn't expect it to be {{summoner:14}} every time I damage the enemy, but when the enemy gets away with 15 HP after you just hit him with corruption, I start to think I'd be better of with restoring 10 more mana. 
I'm not saying the opportunity for it to be better than the old one isn't there if they adjust some numbers a bit, but I am saying they need to adjust some numbers .__.

ok I'll agree with you on the numbers, but only because I was Yorick with the potion in top lane vs Poppy
though burning + ghouls + Yorick Ult = screw you jungle tryndamere

Yorick vs Poppy
what is this madness
where did the mana go
Both of them did one full combo and then farmed for an entire minute before they could do it again.
pretty much, except I had {{item:3070}}  yay mana regen
Yorick vs poppy. I have trouble finding even one of those in a game. But you have lived the experience of having played a game with both in it. I envy you.
I have blacksmith poppy
I only have Lolipoppy and rag doll poppy. I am hoping when she gets reworked they do a skin sale for her. I want all her skins.
Nah, if Flesheater was put on rift, THEN that'd be the real Nasus item.

i still didnt buy this item, isnt it for when you're behind?

It for if you want to play passive in lane like nasus does. Cause if your opponent doesn't build it and you but just farm lane safely at 100 cs you'll have a 300 gold lead, unless it's like GankyP/Try/Yas. But I build it because it has synergy with Nasus's kit (add 3 lifesteal on hit with keystone when dueling/farming with Q anyways and can afford to build tankier because of the scaling Q damage.)

P.S. Does Runic Armor work or is it bugged I've been using it, but I heard in some instances it doesn't work.

one thing i wanna know is if bandit (4th tier in cunning) works with {{champion:75}}  Spirit Fire or {{champion:57}}  Sapliings, im thinking it could be kinda op since mana regen increased so you can cast this a little more and get like 10 g for cast
bandit only works on basic attacks (the tooltip is wrong)
400g lead. It gives 100g per minion, THEN 300 more.
THEN YOU SELL IT AND BUT A NEW ONE
Why would you buy a new one? 0.o it's one thing to get it in place of a Doran's so you're 400g ahead of the enemy if you have the same CS.
Because reasons

I tried it out cause #yolo as it does have synergy with his kit. Runic Armor should work, but 8% bonus from 3 health per hit is nothing ._. Much better to use 2% ability damage and the Spellvamp/Lifesteal in Ferocity in conjunction. No lifesteal item I was healing for 110 at level 6.
I use both Ferocity and Resolve the +3 per hit is just icing on the cake. Cause it's 8 percent of his 10%+2%(from masteries)+4.5 from runes + keystone master
Too much Lifesteal TOO MUCH LIFESTEAL!!!
